faq.question: Does Micepad support CME credit tracking?
faq.answer: Yes, Micepad can track session attendance and generate reports for continuing medical education credits.

faq.question: Is Micepad suitable for pharmaceutical events?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We support pharma industry compliance requirements and have experience with medical conferences of all sizes.

faq.question: Can attendees access speaker presentations?
faq.answer: Yes, the app supports document sharing, presentation downloads, and on-demand video for sessions.
